name: TERRAM PACIS
goal: We are a training provider organisation that provides youth workers, adult educators as well as young and adults learners with learning opportunities through training processes and create the educational materials that meet their learning need based on the assessed gaps & needs toward their social, personal or professional development.
interests: Environment, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Migration and asylum, Youth
euInitiatives: European policies in the fields of education, training and youth.
